chunk:
Directions: Apply a few drops in the palms of your hands and apply over clean skin in the morning and night after cleansing and before moisturizing.

Warnings: Product intended for cosmetic use only. If irriation occurs discontinue use. Store below 30 C/86 F . Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.
book: 0469-KORA Organics Plant Stem Cell Retinol Alternative Serum
